sys_hub_flow.name: CC Service Request

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update the RITM with values from the variables
auto close the original request item
update who the ITPM is in the original request to the ITPM who approved this request
get the variables from the original request
notify Requested For and POC that ITPM has rejected CCSR
generate TASK For PMO to get SOW & Quote or PMO from vendor

sys_variable_value.value: Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Retrieve SOW & Quote or ROM from vendor and attach to original Contact Center Servic Request^u_assignment_organization={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.u_assignment_organization}}^assignment_group={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assigned_to}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Wait until a PMO gets assigned the request
update the original request to in approval state. (The POC is next to approve this request)
notify clients that a task order has been generated for implementation by the COR
find the ITPM who approved
generate a TASK for the PMO to verify the requirements of the request

sys_element_mapping.value: description=Please verify requirements with the client before moving on^assignment_group={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.assignment_group}}^assigned_to={{975f6ca6-39ef-42f0-9355-3302209bde2e.record.assigned_to}}^u_assignment_organization={{Service Catalog_1.request_item.u_assignment_organization}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Notify Clients that SOW & quote or ROM completed.
Create a task for COR to open a TASK for vendor implementation

sys_variable_value.value: assignment_group={"display":"EID Project Management","value":"75faae376f489200a0b002e6eb3ee484"}^description=Please open a task order for this Contact Center Service Request and attach a copy to the request.
Generate a Task Order for Vendor Implementation

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: update who the COR is on the original request
have COR close the request when vendor implementation done

sys_element_mapping.value: description=upon notification that Vendor Implementation is done, please verify completion.^assigned_to={{a0ceddc9-4fb8-425a-ab6c-4d4ece2d0ad1.Catalog Task.assigned_to}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: get approval from ITPM
notify clients that ITPM has approved
